page.title: 02The School.
page.content: The village school is named Ysgol Thomas Stephens after a well known poet who lived in the village in the last century. It is a primary school catering for children between the ages of 4 and 11.At present there are 46 children on roll in 3 classes.Headteacher is Mr Carmichael who takes Class 3,Mrs Davies takes Class 2 and Mrs Coughlan takes Class 1 with the help of a nursery assistant Mrs Williams. There is a small kitchen which provides lunch for the children. On leaving this school most children go on to Ystradgynlais Comprehensive,though children from the Ystradfellte area sometimes transfer to Brecon High.A small number go to Church schools or private schools. {
